claim.text: Using LLMs predicts stock ratings more accurately than traditional methods when assessed by forward returns.
claim.exact_quote: Our benchmark method outperforms traditional stock rating methods when assessed by forward returns.

evidence.evidence_text: Our benchmark method outperforms traditional stock rating methods when assessed by forward returns.
evidence.exact_quote: Our benchmark method outperforms traditional stock rating methods when assessed by forward returns.

claim.text: Incorporating financial fundamentals enhances ratings accuracy.
claim.exact_quote: Specifically, incorporating financial fundamentals enhances ratings accuracy.

evidence.evidence_text: Specifically, incorporating financial fundamentals enhances ratings accuracy.
evidence.exact_quote: Specifically, incorporating financial fundamentals enhances ratings accuracy.

claim.text: Integrating news data to LLMs improves short-term performance.
claim.exact_quote: While integrating news data improves short-term performance, substituting detailed news summaries with sentiment scores reduces token use without loss of performance.

evidence.evidence_text: While integrating news data improves short-term performance, substituting detailed news summaries with sentiment scores reduces token use without loss of performance.
evidence.exact_quote: While integrating news data improves short-term performance, substituting detailed news summaries with sentiment scores reduces token use without loss of performance.

claim.text: Omitting news data entirely from LLMs enhances performance by reducing bias in many cases.
claim.exact_quote: In many cases, omitting news data entirely enhances performance by reducing bias.

evidence.evidence_text: In many cases, omitting news data entirely enhances performance by reducing bias.
